message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to show you this amazing product! I'm willing to let it go for $150. It's a great deal, and I'm confident you'll love it.
Hi Alice, I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $120. Would you be willing to consider that price?

Hi Bob, I understand you're interested in the product, but I'm not willing to go as low as $120. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer it to you for $135. It's still a great deal, and I'm confident you'll love it.
Hi Alice, I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I was thinking more along the lines of $125. Would you be willing to consider that price?
Hi Bob, I'm still not willing to go as low as $125. I'm willing to make one more concession and offer it to you for $130. This is the lowest I'm willing to go, but I think it's still a great deal.

Hi Alice, I appreciate your willingness to make a concession, but I'm still thinking more along the lines of $125. I'm willing to meet you halfway again and offer $127.50. Would you be willing to consider that price?

Hi Bob, I'm still not willing to go as high as $127.50. I'm willing to meet you halfway again and offer it to you for $129.50. This is the last concession I'm willing to make, but I think it's still a great deal.

Hi Alice, I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway again, but I'm still thinking more along the lines of $125. I'm willing to make one more concession and offer $126.50. Would you be willing to consider that price?

Hi Bob, I'm still not willing to go as high as $126.50. I'm going to have to draw the line here and stick to my original offer of $135. If you're not willing to meet me at that price, I'll have to consider other options.

Hi Alice, I understand that you're sticking to your original offer, but I'm still not willing to pay $135. I'm willing to walk away from the deal if I can't get a better price. I'll make one final offer of $128. If you're willing to meet me at that price, I'll take the deal. Otherwise, I'll consider buying from John for $150.
